name: The Colosseum (MissingTheMoon)
description:
You play as a samurai girl fighting robots in a futuristic Colosseum. Enemies spawn around you. Can you beat them all?

This game is still early on but we work hard to release it as a full game on steam. The art and sound of the game will still change a lot. We want the game to be as fun as possible. Casuals will have some time to get into it. But dont worry! There will be a lot of hard content.

To stay updated on our progress you can follow us on Twitter
You can also watch me make the game live on Twitch
We start making devlogs and will put them on itch and Youtube

If you have any feedback / criticsm / thoughts, or if you find any bugs let us know in the comments below! These kind of things are really helpful and are much appreciated! Making noise about this game, by sharing this everywhere is also appreciated a lot!

Controls for Keyboard

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys
Dash - 'K' or 'X'
Attack - 'J' or 'Z'
Heal - 'L' or 'C' (Hold) Only possible inside the red circle
Shield - Spacebar OR Ctrl
IAI Draw - 'I' or 'V'

Controls for Controller

Any controller should work, layout is the Xbox controller

Move   -  Left Joystick
Dash  -  'A'
Attack - 'X'
Heal - 'B' (Hold) Only possible inside the red circle
Shield - LB or RB;
IAI Draw - 'Y' or 'V'
